Maladies Treated: Slows cancer cell growth in breast cancer

Anti-cancer effect of the intestine: ya ma ren (flax seed) contains large amount of soluble fiber which can reduce the toxicity of the digested substances and speed up the secretion of the feces, thus reducing the duration of the time of stimulating substance on the mucous membrane of the intestine
Ya ma root can help the function of the kidneys to excrete toxins
Ya ma root contains large amount of omega-3 fatty acid which can lower blood lipids and lower the LDL in the blood and can reduce arteriosclerosis
Medical Function: Ya ma ren (flax seed) and its root contain large amount of lignan which is a strong anti-oxidant and can inhibit the production of harmful carcinogenic substances
Inhibits the growth of prostate cells: In vitro studies showed that the lignan of the ya ma ren (flax seed) can inhibit the growth of the cells of the prostate gland itself

Flax Seeds are the highest dietary source of lignan, containing 75 times the amount compared to the plant with the next highest source of plant lignan. The majority of the plant lignan component of flax seeds is located in the outer husk of the seed
Dosage:
15 ~ 30 grams per day
1½ - 3 heaping tablespoons (15 to 30g) per day.
One tablespoon (20 ml or ~ 10 g) of flax seeds contains 4 grams of a-linolenic acid and 4 grams of mucilage.
Samples of Formulae: For high level of low-density lipoprotein (LDL): ya ma root 50 g. Make into decoction. Take it every day for 4 weeks. The LDL may lower 8%.
Contraindications:
Omega-3 is a highly unstable fat and can become rancid quickly and carcinogenic. Do not use flax seed oil for deep fat frying because omega-3 cannot stand high heat. Store flax seed and flax oil in black container and refrigerate. Discard seeds or oil that smells fishy or rancid, because that signals toxicity.
Seed should be washed before using to avoid the mold Aspergillus niger (toxic for the respiration system) and Aspergillus flavus (toxic for the liver). These molds are commonly found in grains and are extremely toxic.
Linamarin, after hydrolysis, can release free hydrogen cyanide acid, which can suffocate and poison the cells.
Research: A diet rich in flax seed seems to reduce the size, aggressiveness and severity of tumors in mice that have been genetically engineered to develop prostate cancer, according to new research from Duke University Medical Center. And in 3 percent of the mice the flax seed diet kept them from getting the disease at all. (From news release issued by Duke University Medical Center).
Notes:
Seed must be ground for consumption because of the tough seed coat that is indigestible. The ground-up seeds should be taken with water since the mucilage absorbs 5 times the weight of the seed.
It is not advisable to use flax seed in baked food since the fatty acid omega-3 cannot withstand high heat and can become carcinogenic.

Other: Linamarin (after hydrolysis, releases hydrogen cyanide acid)

Original Text:
flax seed, ya ma, Complementary and Alternative Healing University









    Complementary and Alternative Healing University

for

Properties

(characteristics)﹕

Medical functions:

藥理﹕
 



Ya ma ren (flax seed) and 
            its root contain large amount of lignan which is a strong anti-oxidant 
            and can inhibit the production of  harmful carcinogenic substances.

Anti-cancer of the intestine 
            effect:: ya ma ren (flax seed) contains large amount of soluble fiber 
            which can reduce the toxicity of the digested substances and speed up 
            the secretion of the feces, thus reducing the duration of the time of 
            stimulating substance on the mucous membrane of the intestine.

Ya ma root can help the

Ya ma root contains large

Ya ma inhibits the growth

亞麻和
            其根部含大量的木酚素 (lignan) 。具有很强的抗氧化特性，能有效遏
            制促使癌生成的有害化學物 質。

對防治
            腸癌的作用﹕富含纤维素，可减輕腸道中消化物產生的不良影响﹐加快腸道中廢物的排泄，减 短對腸内黏膜有剌激性的物質在腸道中停留的时间。

亞麻根
            有助于腎臟的排毒功能 。

亞麻根
            富含的脂肪酸，可降低血脂，低血液中的低密度胆固醇 (LDL)﹐治疗血管硬化。


控制攝護腺細胞生長。 體外的實驗證明
亞麻仁木酚素(lignan)可 
            以控制攝護腺細胞本身之生長。

It is not advisable to

              high heat and can become carcinogenic.

            Flax Seeds are the highest dietary source of  lignan. They 
            contain 75 times the quantity of  Lignan compared to the other 
            plants that contain next highest source of Plant Lignan. The majority 
            of the Plant lignan component of flax seeds is located in the outer 
            husk of the Flax Seed .

 





Dosage Per Day:

            (One tablespoon (20 ml or ~ 10 g) of flax seeds contains 4 grams of
            
a-linolenic acid and 4 g of mucilage).





Samples of formulae

:處方舉例﹕



For high level of  
            low-density lipoprotein (LDL): ya ma root 50 g. Make into decoction. 
            Take it every day for 4 weeks. The LDL may lower 8%.

低密度胆固醇過高﹕亞麻根50克。煎湯。連續四周可
            使低密度胆固醇 (LDL) 降低8%。





Modern Research:

現代研究﹕


 





Cautions:

禁忌﹕



Omega-3 is a highly unstable 
            fat and can become rancid quickly and become carcinogenic. Do not use 
            flax seed oil for deep fat frying because omega-3 cannot stand high 
            heat. Store flax seed and flax oil in black container and refrigerate. 
            Discard seed or oil that smells fishy or rancid, because that smell 
            signals toxicity.

Seed should be washed before 
            using to avoid the mold , Aspergillus niger,  which is toxic 
            for the respiration system and the mold , Aspergillus flavus,  
            which is toxic for the liver.  These molds are commonly found in 
            grains and are extremely toxic.




        　


Linamarin, after hydrolysis, can release free hydrogen 
        cyanide acid, which can suffocate and poison the cells.

亞麻苦甙（linamarin） ，經水解後可析出游
        離態的氢氰酸，致組織细胞窒息中毒。
 

A diet rich in flax seed seems to reduce the size, aggressiveness and severity 
        of tumors in mice that have been genetically engineered to develop prostate 
        cancer, according to new research from Duke University Medical Center. And 
        in 3 percent of the mice the flax seed diet kept them from getting the disease 
        at all. (From news release issued by Duke 
        University Medical Center).

Last update: Oct 4, 2013; 10 p.m. LAH

Geography: native of southern part of mainland China
Maladies Treated: psoriasis (using water decoction of lei gong teng and alcohol extract of lei gong teng: both contain 50 g lei gong teng and 50 g ji xue teng (milletia root), taken orally 50 ml, twice a day after meals. Therapy period: 30 days. In clinical trial: 193 patients, alcohol extract effective rate: 86.2%, water decoction effective rate: 72.72%)
Medical Function: used as immunosuppressive agent on autoimmune diseases
Samples of Formulae: Psoriasis: Using water decoction of lei gong teng (thunder god vine) and alcohol extract of lei gong teng (thunder god vine): Both contain 50 g lei gong teng (thunder god vine) and 50 g ji xue teng (milletia root). Take orally 50 ml, twice a day after meals. 30 days is one therapy period.
Contraindications:
Toxic reactions include dizziness, palpitation, weakness, nausea, vomiting, stomach ache, diarrhea, pain in liver and kidney areas, bleeding in the digestive tract, respiration and circulation exhaustion, and death.
Decrease of total blood cell counts.
External use of lei gong teng tincture can cause mutation type of illness.
Long-term use can significantly decrease bone mineral density in females with systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE).
Long-term use causes hair loss and malfunction of immune system.
Large dosages and/or long-term usage can be toxic to kidneys.
Lei gong teng is a highly toxic herb; the cortex is extremely toxic and should be used by removing bark section, including two layers of bark and the back in tree crevices.
Research:
Four compounds purified from Tripterygium wilfordii may confer protection against the FSGS (focal segmental glomerulosclerosis) factor.
a. There are four compounds extracted from lei gong teng (thunder god vine) that can protect the kidneys against focal segmental glomerulosclerosis.
b. Clinical study: For psoriasis, using water decoction and alcohol extract of lei gong teng (thunder god vine) (each 50 g lei gong teng and 50 g ji xue teng (milletia root)), 50 ml taken twice daily after meals for 30 days: 193 patients total. Alcohol extract: 116 patients, effective rate 86.2%; water decoction: 77 patients, effective rate 72.72%. It showed that the alcohol extract was more effective than the water decoction. [21]
Other details: Long-term use of lei gong teng could significantly decrease bone mineral density in females with systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) (Department of dermatology, Huashan hospital, Shanghai Medical University, Shanghai 200040, China (Huang L and Feng SF); Radiology Institute, Shanghai Medical University, Shanghai 200040, China (Wang HF)).
Notes: Focal segmental glomerulosclerosis is scar tissue that forms in areas of the glomeruli of the kidneys that filter harmful or unnecessary substances out of the body.
References: (a). M. Sharma, R. Sharma, XL Ge, R.S.Rdy, E.T.McCarthy, V. J. Savin, Medical College of Wisconsin, Milwaukee, WI, U.S.A.

(b). Department of dermatology, Huashan hospital, Shanghai Medical University, Shanghai 200040, China (Huang L and Feng SF); Radiology Institute, Shanghai Medical University, Shanghai 200040, China (Wang HF).
Further Reading: See Chinese web page , submitted for writing competition sponsored by the Education Department of ROC in Taiwan.
Original Text: lei gong teng, Tripterygium wilfordii Hook.f., Complementary and Alternative Healing UniveristyComplementary and Alternative Healing University   中藥詞典    Chinese Herb Dictionary      Search this site     在本網站找資料　See more menu at the bottom of page　lei gong teng (thunder god vine),  雷公藤  (in English and Chinese 中英文)Translated and edited by: Joe Hing Kwok ChuClick here if you are using Internet ExplorerThe herb of lei gong teng comes from the roots, leaves and flowers of the tripterygium wilfordii Hook. f. It is collected during summer and autumn. Lei gong teng is a deciduous climbing vine growing to 12 meters,  with brown, angular, downy twigs. The leaves are light green, smooth on top, and pale gray with light hairs underneath.  They have crenate margins and pointed apexes,  and are ovate to elliptic, 5-15 cm long, 2.5 - 7 cm wide. The scented hermaphroditic (having male and female organs) flowers are small and whitish with five petals and are about 9 mm across. The fruit is 3-winged, and brownish red, about 1.5 cm long.The plant can grow in light (sandy), medium (loamy) and heavy (clay) soils. It can survive in acid, neutral and basic (alkaline) soil.  It can grow in semi-shade (light woodland) or no shade. It requires moist soil.Pharmaceutical name:英文药名： Radix Tripterygium wilfordiiBiological name:拉丁學名： Tripterygium wilfordii Hook. f.Pron.in Japanese:日語發音：taiwankurozuruPron. in Korean:韓語發音：Mi-yeok-jul-na-muPron. in Cantonese粤語發音：leoi4 gung1 tang4Common Name:英文名： three-wing-nutFolk Name:民間名稱："Walk Seven Steps and Die" , "Intestine Breaking Plant"七步倒，斷腸草。Distribution:分佈：native of southern part of mainland China, Taiwan, Burma原産於中國南部，臺灣，缅甸。Properties (characteristics):性味：bitter and very toxic苦，劇毒。Actions & Indications:主治：　for: anti-inflammation,  kills worms, resolves toxins, treating proteinuric renal disease, used as immunosuppressive agent on autoimmune diseases.抗炎，殺蟲，消毒，治蛋白尿腎臟病，於免疫系统病以抑制免疫系统。Chemical ingredients:化學成份：　　1. Saponins:(1). wilforgine, wilforgine-B, wilfordine, wilfornine, wilfortrine, wilforttrine-D, wilforzine[1-3], wilformine [4], wilfordinic acid, hyudroxywilfordic acid [5],wilfornine [6], neowilforine [7](2). celacinnine, celafurine, celabenzine, celallocinnine [8-9](3). triptofordinine A-1, A-2 [10],  triptofordin D-1, D-2, E [11], triptofordin A, B, C-1 C-2 [12], triptofordin F-1, F-2, F-3, F-4 [13]2.(1). triptolide, tripdiolide, triptonide,[14-15], tripterolide[16].(2). triptolidenol [16-17], tripnolide [18], neotriptophenolide, triptophenolide methyl ether [19], isoneotrip-tophenolide, hypolide methyl ether [20].(3). triptonoterpene, triptonoterpene methyl ether [17],  triptonoterpenol [21]12-ydroxy-abieta-8, 11, 13 -trien-3-one, 11-hydroxy-14-methoxy-abieta-8, 11-hydroxy-14-methoxy-abieta-8, 11, 13-trien-3-one [22].3. (1). wilforlide A, wilforlide B [23].(2). tritotriterpenoid lactone [24], tretotriterpenic acid A [25,26], tritotriterpenic acid B [27], tritotriterpenic acid C [28], 3-epikatonic acid [29], polpunonic acid, triptodihydroxy acid methyl ester [30], tripterine [31].(3).3,24-dioxofridelan-29-oic acid [29], salaspermic acid [29,32].4. wilfornide [20]5. 1,8-dihydroxy-4-hydroxymethyl anthraquinone [33].6. syringareisnol [34].7. dulcitol, glucose [31], tanninMedical Functions:　　　　1. Effects on immune system2. Effects on anti-inflammatory3. Effects on anti-cancer4. Effects on contraception5. Effects on urinary system6. Effects on anti-organism and worms7. Other Effects     Anti rejection on transplants8. Inside body9. Effects of toxicityOther Research:其他研究：　Four compounds purified from T. wilfordii may confer protection against the FSGS (focal segmental gomerulosclerosis) factor.a有四種從雷公藤提取的化合物能保護保護腎臟對抗局部性腎絲球硬化症。Research on Pharmacological Processes:See Research LibrarianModern Clinical Application:1.proliferative arthritis　2. inflammation of spinal cord3. lupus4. purpura5. kidney inflammation6. asthma7. tuberculosis of the lungs8. psoriasis9. dermatitis10. Reiter syndrome　Psoriasis: Using water decoction of lei gong teng and alcohol extract of lei gong teng:They both contain 50 lei gong teng 50 g, and ji xue teng 50 g each. Take orally 50 ml, twice a day after meals.30 days is one therapy period.Result:Total patients: 193Patients taking alcohol extract: 116Effective rate: 86.2%Patients taking water decoction: 77Effective rate: 72.72%It showed that the alcohol extract was more effective than the water decoction. [21]　Toxicity and Side Effects:　　1. Toxic reactions: dizziness, palpitation, weakness, nausea, vomiting, stomach ache, diarrhea, pain in liver and kidney areas, bleeding in the digestive tract, even respiration and circulation exhaustion and death.2. Decrease of total blood cell counts (2)3. Mutation type of illness: using lei gong teng tincture for external use can cause mutation type of illness. (3)4. Long -term use of lei gong teng could significantly decrease bone mineral density of levels in female systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE)b5. Long -term use of lei gong teng causes hair loss and malfunction of immune system.6. Large dosages and/or long term usage can be toxic to kidneys.Lei gong teng is a highly toxic herb, especially the cortex is extremely toxic and should be used by removing bark department, including two layers of bark and the back in tree crevices.雷公藤是一種劇毒藥物，尤其皮部毒性極大，使用時應嚴格剝淨皮部，包括二重皮及樹縫中的皮分。 大劑量或長期服用可能對腎臟有毒。　antidotes:See Prevention and treatmentsNote: Focal segmental glomerulosclerosis is scar tissue that forms in areas of the glomeruli of the kidneys that filter harmful or unnecessary substances out of the body.Other related websites:see picture on another siteSee Chinese web page , submitted for writing competition sponsored by the Education Department of ROC in Taiwan.[n] If you need the complete bibliography in a hurry, please email our Research Librarian. Geography: Mainly produced in Jilin, Beijing, Tianjin, Hebei, Shaanxi, Shandong, Anhui, Jiangsu, Zhejiang, Jiangxi, Guangdong, Sichuan areas of China
Samples of Formulae:
For lack of mother's milk
Name of formula: chi xiao dou soup
Composition: chi xiao dou 15 g. Add water to make soup. Simmer for about 2 hours. Make and drink it daily for 3 to 5 days.

For edema and to promote urination
Name of formula: Carp with chi xiao dou and chen pi (aged tangerine peel) soup
Composition: Carp (about 500 g), chi xiao dou 30 g, chen pi 6 g. Add appropriate amount of water and simmer until tender. Make into 2 servings.
Contraindications:
Not to use for long period because of its diuretic property. Long term usage may dry out the body.
According to a classical writing, do not use chi xiao dou within 100 days of snake bite. 性逐津液，久食令人枯燥, 瘦人。《随息居飲食譜》：蛇咬者百日内忌之。

Chemical Ingredients: Per 100 grams of chi xiao dou contains: protein (α,β-golbulin) 20.7 g
vitamin B2 0.31 mg (English text) / vitamin B2 0.11 mg (Chinese text)

Simmer for about 2 hours. Make and drink it daily for 3 to 5 days. 產婦乳汁 不夠﹕赤小豆15g， 加水燒湯。連續喝3～5天。 For : Edema and to promote urinationName of formula: Carp with chi xiao dou and chen pi soupComposition:  Carp (about 500 g), chi xiao dou 30 g,  chen pi 6 gAdd appropriate amount of water and simmer until tender. Make into 2 servings. 鯉 魚 赤 豆 陳 皮 湯   功 效:  利 水 消 腫 。  組成﹕:  鯉 魚 1 條 （ 約 5 0 0 克 ） ， 赤 小 豆 3 0 克 ， 陳皮 6 克 。 上 三 味 放 沙 鍋 內 。慢火煲 至 爛 熟 。分作兩餐 吃 。Modern Research:現代研究﹕Click here.Toxicity & Cautions:毒素與禁忌﹕Not to use for long period because of its diuretic property. Long term usage may dry out the body.According to a classical writing, do not use chi xiao dou within 100 days of snake bite. 性逐津液，久食令人枯燥, 瘦人。《随息居飲食譜》：�蛇咬 者百日内忌之。�　 Sponsors' Ads by Google 以下為谷歌所提供贊助者之廣告Click here for inquiry  A manuscript... writing and translation in progressList of Health ProblemsChinese Herb DictionaryToxicity of Some Herbs Side Effect of Some Herbs Herbs that can be toxic to kidneysTraditional Chinese MedicineTCM DiagnosisSamples of FormulaeAcupuncturecopy right 版權所有Qigong (chi kung)Prescribed Drug DictionaryEmail our web master for  your suggestion (not for inquiry)Biochemistry DictionaryGeneral Online LibraryQigong classesLecture SlidesResearch LibrarianSearchQigong classesHomeWeather Report DisclaimerLast update: April 9, 2009;12:49 p.m. LAH

Maladies Treated: 翳膜胬肉 (pterygium, nebula, membrane with fleshy growth on eye)

Chemical Ingredients: a small amount of ferric oxide

Geography: Mainly in Guangdong, Sichuan, Yunnan, Hubei, Guizhou provinces of China
Maladies Treated: lung deficient with cough and asthma
heavy vaginal bleeding not during menses
prolapse of rectum (jin ying gen, root, used in decoction)
burns or scaldings (jin ying gen, under layer skin of the root, external use)
recurring filariasis (disease caused by infestation of tissue with filariae) (jin ying zi, fruit, used in decoction with eggs and rock sugar)
erysipelas (acute streptococcus bacterial infection of the upper dermis and superficial lymphatics) on the leg (jin ying zi, fruit, used in decoction with eggs and rock sugar)
Medical Function: Lowers the plasma cholesterol and β-lipoprotein, and lessens the degree of damage of coronary atherosclerosis in rabbits
Inhibits the contraction of smooth muscles

Alcohol extract of the root can resist oxygen deprivation: the alcohol extract of jin ying gen (root) significantly prolongs survival time of mice under conditions of normobaric hypoxia, specific myocardial hypoxia, cerebral ischemic hypoxia, and swimming
Samples of Formulae:
For spermatorrhea, urinary frequency, or vaginal discharge due to shenxu (kidney deficient): Prescription: jin ying zi, qian shi (Euryale seed). Make into decoction and use as tea.

For treatment of prolapse of rectum: Prescription: jin ying gen (root) 30 to 60 g. Make into decoction. Make into 3 servings. Use as tea.

For burns or scaldings: Prescription: jin ying gen (root). Scrape off the external covering. Get the under layer skin of the root. Cut into small pieces. Add some sweet rice and smash together. Add some water and cook to boiling. Strain. After cooling down, use duck feather to apply to affected area.

For treatment of recurring filariasis (disease caused by infestation of tissue with filariae), erysipelas (acute streptococcus bacterial infection of the upper dermis and superficial lymphatics) on the leg: Prescription: jin ying zi (fruit) 90 g. Boil with water. Strain. Add 3 chicken eggs and 30 g of rock sugar. Cook till sugar is melted. Drink before meals.
Contraindications: Do not use it just to enhance sexual appetite. (Li Shizhen: 不可用之於增強性慾)
Research:
Lowers the plasma cholesterol and β-lipoprotein, and lessens the degree of damage of coronary atherosclerosis of rabbits.

The alcohol extract of the root can resist oxygen deprivation: jin ying gen alcohol extract significantly prolongs survival time of mice under normobaric hypoxia, specific myocardial hypoxia, cerebral ischemic hypoxia, and swimming.

Chemical Ingredients: rich in sugars, of which 60% reducing sugars (fructose 3.3%)

Drink before meals.治遺精﹐ 尿多﹐或白帶﹕芡 實 , 金櫻子。水煎服。治小兒脫肛：金櫻根一至二兩。水煎，每日一劑，分三次服。(廣西《中草藥新醫療法處方集》)治湯火傷：金櫻根洗淨，去表面粗皮，取二層皮切碎，加糯米少許，同擂爛，再加適量清水，放入鍋内煮沸，過濾 ，待冷，用鴨毛蘸藥汁搽塗患處，日二，三次。(《江西民間草藥驗方》)治下肢流火 屢發：金櫻根三兩， 水煎，取湯煮雞蛋三個，加入冰糖一兩溶化，飯前服。(《江西民間草藥驗方》)註: 流火是丹毒或絲蟲病 (由帶有絲虫的組織感染引起的病). 丹毒是真皮上部和表層淋巴管的急性鏈球菌細菌感染Chemical ingredients:化學成份﹕citric acid, malic acid, tannin, resin, vitamin C,  saponins 17 12%;  rich in sugar, of which 60% reducing sugars (fructose, 33%), 1.9% sucrose and a small amount of starch.檸檬酸，蘋果酸，鞣質，樹脂，維生素C, 含皂甙17.12%；另含豐富的糖類， 其中有還原糖60%（果糖3.3%）， 蔗糖1.9%以及少量澱粉。Dosage:用量:5 to 10 g for decoction.煎服5-10克。Cautions:禁忌:do not use it just to enhance sexual appetite.李 時 珍 ﹕ 不 可 用 之 於 增 強 性 慾 。Search this site       Sponsors' Ads by Google 以下為谷歌所提供贊助者之廣告  A manuscript... writing, translating and proofreading                          in progressClick here for comment.
